page.title: 11TRADE AND SHOPPING, EGERTON
page.content: The village has few shops, and these tend to cater for daily requirements such as groceries, newspapers, tobacco, confectionary, green groceries and drinks. Whilst 45% regularly, and 55% occasionally use the local shops,94% buy the bulk of their requirements at supermarkets or major stores in Bolton. The post office is regularly used by 70% of the population, and there are two mail collections daily.The sole telephone box is not used often, as 93% of houses have a private telephone. The majority of residents,79%, consider the local shopping facilities to be adequate. There are no banks or financial institutions in the village.
